attributes.action: allow motor vehicles to turn left at a Red traffic light, when safe to do so. Reduce congestion and pollution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I suggest to reduce traffic congestion and ultimately pollution, allow motor vehicles to turn left at traffic signals (Only when safe to do so).  Clearly not all junctions can allow this.  Therefore, as in the USA, careful consideration is required for signage at junctions where it would be too dangerous to carry out such manouvers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
